name: Classic Wood Blocks
description:
Best wood themed block puzzle game. Excise your concentration, best brain games for kids and adults with wood puzzle building blocks for free and you can enjoy it everywhere, every time without need online.

How to play:
• Tap to move block.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Create vertical or horizontal line to make block crush.
• Game will be over if there are no more space for any the given blocks.

Features:
• Smooth and delicate animation.
• Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
• Don't worry! No time limits!
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be cleared and you get the score.
• Wood blocks can't be rotated.
• Everyone can play easy!
